video.description:
The Fifth Sense Episode Four: Making Films

We follow Alma Har’el during the making of her latest short film and explore the current state of play within the film industry through the eyes of female filmmakers creating their own platforms and opportunities. We also take a look into Alma’s initiative Free The Bid to see how she’s tackling inequality within the field firsthand.

Featuring leading women from the world of film including directors Crystal Moselle, Lola Bessis, Janicza Bravo and Sundance Institute’s Tabitha Jackson.

Directed by Eva Michon
Cinematographer Ava Berkofsky
Edited by Adam Biskupski

i-D:

Commercial Supervising Producer: Tash Tan
